name: Cooking Speedy Premium
description:
Feel the fever in the kitchen and get frenzy with our latest PREMIUM cooking games!
If you are a fan of food games, girl games or dream of becoming a master chef in the fever kitchen, Cooking Speedy Premium is exactly made for you!
Take part in this strategy and simulation cooking game, you can experience the madness speed of real cooking and challenge your amazing restaurant skills in every rush-hour of the crazy kitchen!
Put on your chef hat and this attractive cooking game will treat you to the most delicious cuisines from all over the world! You can be the star chef in your cooking dream!
FEATURES:
- The best cooking experience for fan of simulation restaurant games and time-management games
- 650+ endless fun and challenging cooking game levels
- A wide variety of delicious meals, dishes to cook
- Adorable and detailed graphics, you can unleash your creativity in the delicious world of 3D cooking games
- Simple and easy controls but addictive gameplay
Cooking Speedy Premium is a perfect combination of cooking games and restaurant games where you can manage your restaurant business and practice your time management skills. In this amazing cooking adventure, you not only need to cook and serve famous customers as well as celebrities but you also have to keep an eye on the clocks!
Makeover your kitchen, decorate your restaurant, upgrade your food, solving puzzles, travel to all over the world and discover world-wide cuisine, cooking games have never been so much fun and exciting! Together we create the most wonderful cooking city and feel the frenzy heat of the cooking fever in our dash adventure!
So why don’t you get ready for a cooking fever in this tasty town? A perfect and beautiful cooking diary and kitchen story are waiting for you now!
Enjoy your cooking journey from now on, and receive sweet gift when downloading Cooking Speedy Premium!
If you have any question or suggestion on Cooking Speedy please contact us at support@beemob.vn
